body:
Second this one. Thought it was just some mistyped ID/key until I found this issue. Even created a second app key for testing but still the same result.

Remote tree listing test also throws an error, and possibly with every custom app key authentication:
```
$ rclone tree remote: -vv
2018/08/01 17:15:57 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.42" starting with parameters ["rclone" "tree" "remote:" "-vv"]
2018/08/01 17:16:06 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/user/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2018/08/01 17:16:07 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 20ms
2018/08/01 17:16:07 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 1/10 (error Invalid authorization (401 unauthorized))
2018/08/01 17:16:07 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 40ms
2018/08/01 17:16:07 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 2/10 (error Invalid authorization (401 unauthorized))
2018/08/01 17:16:07 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 80ms
2018/08/01 17:16:07 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 3/10 (error Invalid authorization (401 unauthorized))
...
2018/08/01 17:16:13 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 10.24s
2018/08/01 17:16:13 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 10/10 (error Invalid authorization (401 unauthorized))
2018/08/01 17:16:13 Failed to create file system for "remote:": failed to authorize account: failed to authenticate: Invalid authorization (401 unauthorized)
```

I had an experiment with this...

Note that you need to put the `applicationKeyId` into the config as `account` - this will get over the 401 error you are seeing.

```
[b2]
type = b2
account = abcdef123456
key = 0014b7xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
endpoint = 

[b2app]
type = b2
account = 001abcdef1234560000000001
key = K001Xoxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
endpoint = 
```

I've made a patch to limit the buckets to just the bucket in the key (if it is limited) and that seems to work quite well.

Can you give this a go?  I haven't updated the docs yet.  Having to substitute the  `applicationKeyId` as the `account` is going to need a bit of explaining in the docs and the configurator. 

https://beta.rclone.org/branch/v1.42-063-g7a17a804-fix-2428-b2-app-key/ (uploaded in 15-30 mins)

Can confirm, works on app keys with limited buckets now on beta!

`applicationKeyId` is what I initially used but then it didn't seem work so I tried the master acc ID instead, though still to no avail earlier. It actually makes sense that the new specific `applicationKeyId` should be used instead of the main one for this feature.

Great work man, Thanks for the quick fix.
@ncw Can confirm beta works as expected here - thanks so much for the quick turnaround on this :) Look forward to when this hits release :)

Great - thanks for testing :-)

I'll re-open this to remind me to write docs and merge to master!

I've added some docs and merged this to master now :-)

This will be in

https://beta.rclone.org/v1.42-068-ga119ca9f/ (uploaded in 15-30 mins)

and in [the latest beta](https://beta.rclone.org) from then and v1.43 when it is released.

I can use `rclone lsd` to list, but I cannot use `rclone copy` to upload file:

```
gslin@colo-sbd-1 [~] [08:38] rclone -vv copy ~/tmp/www.tar.gz gslin-b2:gslin-backup-colo-sbd-1/
2018/08/17 08:38:35 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.42-101-geb84b58dÎ²" starting with parameters ["rclone" "-vv" "copy" "/h
ome/gslin/tmp/www.tar.gz" "gslin-b2:gslin-backup-colo-sbd-1/"]
2018/08/17 08:38:35 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/gslin/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2018/08/17 08:38:36 DEBUG : www.tar.gz: Couldn't find file - need to transfer
2018/08/17 08:38:36 DEBUG : B2 bucket gslin-backup-colo-sbd-1: Unauthorized: Unknown 401  (401 unauthorized)
2018/08/17 08:38:36 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 20ms
2018/08/17 08:38:36 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 1/10 (error Unknown 401  (401 unauthorized))
2018/08/17 08:38:36 DEBUG : B2 bucket gslin-backup-colo-sbd-1: Unauthorized: Unknown 401  (401 unauthorized)
2018/08/17 08:38:36 DEBUG : pacer: Reducing sleep to 10ms
2018/08/17 08:38:36 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, increasing sleep to 20ms
```

```
gslin@colo-sbd-1 [~] [08:38] cat ~/.config/rclone/rclone.conf
[gslin-b2]
type = b2
account = 0012xxxxxxxxxxx0000000009
key = K001Xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
endpoint =
```
Silly question - but does that key have write permissions, and are those permissions for that bucket? :)

Yes:

![https://i.imgur.com/09H4isv.png](https://i.imgur.com/09H4isv.png)

```
gslin@colo-sbd-1 [~] [14:51] rclone lsd gslin-b2:                                                                 
          -1 2018-08-18 14:52:34        -1 gslin-backup-colo-sbd-1
gslin@colo-sbd-1 [~] [14:52] rclone lsd gslin-b2:gslin-backup-colo-sbd-1/
          -1 2018-08-18 14:52:40        -1 test
gslin@colo-sbd-1 [~] [14:53] cat ~/.config/rclone/rclone.conf
[gslin-b2]
type = b2
account = 00127e5b40bba5b0000000009
key = x
endpoint =
```

I managed to replicate this with my test credentials.  Something must have changed at b2 since they were working fine....

I made a fix here - can you give it a go please?

https://beta.rclone.org/branch/v1.42-112-g7c911bf2-fix-2428-b2-app/ (uploaded in 15-30 mins)

Thanks

Thanks for testing :-)

I've merged this to master now here

https://beta.rclone.org/v1.42-112-g7c911bf2/ (uploaded in 15-30 mins)

This will be in [the latest beta](https://beta.rclone.org) from now on and in 1.43
For me works nicely with (and only) version 1.41
Thank you!! Works perfectly here, version 1.42.
